channel.title: Is there a way to change
channel.description: The max combat level of 253 or max skills levels of 135? I'd seriously like to know. Thanks!

item.title: Is there a way to change
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Combat is based on formula. If skills can go over 99, then combat can go over 126. So, just do this, I hope it helped.

Press CTRL F and whatever your max skil lvl is atm, put in the search box "return max lvl. And if you wanted it at 99 (just change it to 99), and you wanted max combat at 126, search for the update that shows max lvl and exp, and you could change it to 99, and change the exp to like… 6,578,482 or something like that.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a way to change
